actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on HELP.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to encourage students, including young women, to pursue demanding careers and higher education degrees in mathematics, science, engineering and technology.

summary.text: High Technology for Girls Act - Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 (ESEA) to provide for programs to encourage students, including young women, to pursue careers and higher education degrees in mathematics, science, engineering, and technology, under ESEA requirements for professional development activities, national teacher training projects, and technology for education.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to encourage students, including young women, to pursue demanding careers and higher education degrees in mathematics, science, engineering and technology.
